titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the definition of "child" to include a child under the age of 16 for whom one or both surviving parents are incapable of providing proper support. (Current law refers to sole or surviving parent only.)
